pages.title: Fermentation Barrel
pages.text: The ferment barrel can hold up to four buckets of fluid. It can be used to ferment fluids or as a storage tank.$(br2)Place the non-fermented fluid into the barrel with the respective yeast to produce a fermented fluid with effects. Use a glass bottle to extract the drink.
$(br2)If you happen to put too much yeast into the barrel, all of it will be consumed in the ferment process.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The ferment barrel is easily crafted using oak planks and iron.$(br2)Currently, there is only one type of ferment barrel.
